00001 #ifndef InterConstants_h
00002 #define InterConstants_h 1

00004 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00005 #include <config.h>

00007 
00008 #include <cmath>
00009 #include "lcio.h"
00010 #include <LCHcalCalibrationObject.hh>
00011 
00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class InterConstants;
00017 
00025 class InterConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00029   InterConstants() {};
00030   
00031   InterConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error) {
00032     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00033     setCellKey(_cellId);
00034     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00035     obj()->setFloatVal(1, error);
00036   };
00037   
00038   InterConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj) {};
00039   
00040   virtual ~InterConstants() {};
00041 
00044   float getInterValue() const {
00045     return getFloatVal(0);
00046   };  
00047 
00050   float getInterError() const {  
00051     return getFloatVal(1);
00052   };
00053   
00056   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00057     return (float) (inputValue * getInterValue());
00058   };
00059   
00062   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00063     return (float) (outputValue / getInterValue());
00064   };  
00065   
00068   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00069     return (float) (inputError * getInterValue() + inputValue * getInterError());
00070   };
00071 
00074   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError) const {
00075     return (float) (sqrt(pow(outputError/outputValue,2)+pow(getInterError()/getInterValue(),2))*(outputValue/getInterValue()));
00076   };      
00077 
00080   bool calibrationValid() const {
00081     return (!std::isnan(getInterValue()) && (getInterValue()>0));
00082   };
00083 
00086   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00087     return true;
00088   };    
00089 
00092   void print (std::ostream& os);
00093   
00096   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00097     return "InterConstants";
00098   };   
00099 
00102   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00103     return "i:CellKey,f:InterValue,f:InterError";
00104   };  
00105     
00106 };
00107 
00108 }
00109 
00110 #endif
